name: Leah Highgate
text: Just ate here for the first time. A casual and quiet place. Everything we had was delicious and served hot by friendly staff. I'm difficult to please so this is high praise indeed. I'll definitely come back and tell my friends about it too.

name: Josh Swindall
text: We dined in and enjoyed it. Customer service was great. His young son was there taking orders and making drinks doing and absolutely stellar job. Food was delicious. We could tell special care taken to presentation, as the food looked almost as good as it tasted. The restaurant was noticeably clean as well. The price was right in line with what it should be. We'll definitely be back.

name: Ashley Sherrard
text: We ordered delivery last night and got the Sesame Chicken, Sweet and Sour Chicken and Crab Rangoons. Everything tasted AWESOME! This is some of the best take-out I've ever had. It took a little while for the food to arrive (almost an hour) but it was well worth the wait. We will definitely be ordering from here again.

name: Natleigh Star
text: My husband and I went to Taiwan Chinese Restaurant March 5, 2013 for our wedding anniversary. We LOVED it. She was very nice. It was very nice to look at her family through out the years. This is the best non buffet in mobile.

name: SM H
text: Best Chinese Food in town! Fast and friendly delivery! Everything is fresh made from scratch. BIG portions. 1 Portion can feed a family!

name: Sonya Murray
text: Excellent service.  The food isn't greasy, it's lighter, they'll customize my order for me. When I go in to pick it up, they're always there to greet me with a smile.  Hands down the best Chinese place in West Mobile.

name: TC Gurus
text: Good authentic Chinese/Taiwanese food. Nothing fancy about the place..but the food is always good. If you like spicy you will have to ask them to kick it up a notch.

name: Emma Fairbanks
text: Whoa! I was embarrassed for the cook when the server placed my tofu fried rice on the table. The tofu looked freeze dried and roasted. I asked for a new, less cooked order of tofu, but we opted to keep it simple and just remove it. Definitely won't be returning, but they should consider discontinuing their service of tofu.

name: Karen Young
text: Nice owners and great food

name: Teddee Jordan
text: My husband isn't big on Chinese and loved it as much as me. Great food!

name: •Boba._.xmochicuddlesUwU
text: They delivered food that smelled like diesel! Luckily it was in a plastic bag. Frid rice was awful, egg rolls were mediocre! Crab rangoons too sweet and I didn't taste any meat! I thought General Chao's chicken was spicey! I won't go to thr restaurant now that I know the delivery food is worst I've had! I tipped the driver $5. Small price to pay for the lesson I learned!! I would recommend this place to NO ONE!!!!!

name: Blake Graham
text: tasted excellent! I'll def be put into my weekly chinese-food routine.

name: Chloe Taylor
text: The food is really good. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's kinda dingy looking on the inside and the staff isn't that friendly.

name: joseph mari gonzalez
text: My favorite place ❤👌 tasty clean and cheap

name: Aline Shepherd
text: Omg best crab Rangoon I've ever had!!! Delicious

name: Marcus Frazier
text: This is the spot that always hits the spot!!!! I'm writing this as I wait love this place.

name: Michelle Files
text: Food was and is awesome, first time ordering and I'm very impressed!!!

name: tony chaney
text: Nice people, awesome food.

name: John St. Pierre
text: A hole in the wall with decent Chinese food.

name: Chris Mastin
text: Best ever!!!!!!!!!!

name: Briana Miley
text: Best Chinese food ever

name: Abigail Casiano
text:
(Translated by Google) The people are friendly, and the food is very tasty 😉

(Original)
Las personas son amables, y la comida es muy rica 😉
